div.span: RRCSD Closed Through End of 2019-2020 School Year

span.div: The Rocky River City School District will be closed through the end of the school year.
During this time, there will be no school or school-sponsored athletics, activities, or meetings.

div.span: RRCSD Closed Through End of 2019-2020 School Year

The Rocky River City School District will be closed through the end of the school year.
During this time, there will be no school or school-sponsored athletics, activities, or meetings.
Student instruction will continue online.

div.span: Students have the opportunity to pursue college-level studies and AP credit
Total number of students in the Rocky River City School District
Number of athletics and activities/clubs offered throughout the District at RRHS, RRMS and Kensington
RRHS offers 10 College Credit Plus Courses which offer eligible students transcripted credit opportunities.
Teachers in the RRCSD have an average of 16.4 years of experience

span.div: At the Rocky River City School District, we provide a CARING environment and EXCEPTIONAL opportunities, resulting in SUCCESSFUL students who are globally COMPETITIVE.
